title: THE BLUE DISHES
content: Katrina’s mother has some pretty dishes. They are blue and white dishes. Katrina has a little plate. Jan has a plate, too. They use their plates at breakfast, dinner, and supper. Katrina likes to wash her mother’s blue and white dishes. She dries them with a little towel. When she dries them, she puts them away in the cupboard. She is very careful. She puts them neatly on the shelves in the cupboard.
